name: Yubo Tao
content: Yubo Tao Yubo Tao Email:taoyubo[at]cad.zju.edu.cn Office:Room 426, Building of Library Information Center, ZijinGang Campus, Zhejiang University Address:State Key Lab of CAD&CG, Zijingang Campus, Zhejiang University, Hangzhou, 310058, P.R.China BRIEF CV Yubo Tao is an associate Professor in State Key Lab of CAD&CG in College of Computer Science and Technology at Zhejiang University. He received his B.S. and Ph.D. degree in computer science and technology from Zhejiang University in China, in 2003 and 2009, respectively. From August 2010 to July 2012, he worked as a Research Fellow in Centre for Visualisation and Data Analytics (CVDA) at University of Bedfordshire. His research interests include scientific visualization, visual analytics and computational electromagnetics.
